title: Teemo Fan FanArt

embed.description: Teemo after a hard day's work! Seen it in my dreams, I've been waiting a while to make this one... I hope you guys like it! #Riotdubyaathedream

body:
Hey guys! 

I know not a lot of Teemo lovers out there, but I'm a HUGE Teemo fan so I couldn't help but make some Teemo FanArt. 
I tried to capture his calm yet deadly self.

I hope you guys like it!

.#Riotdubyaathedream #makeshroomsnotwar

replies.body: That's beautiful :)  I can almost imagine the time-lapse video of the preceding hours where he busily finds just the right place for each mushroom, stopping to sip some water, unrolling his maps to check the distribution, etc.  And now, at the end of the day, it's all done.  Wonderful work.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JnaXekTA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-24T16:44:48.256+0000)
>
> That's beautiful :)  I can almost imaging the time-lapse video of the preceding hours where he busily finds just the right place for each mushroom, stopping to sip some water, unrolling his maps to check the distribution, etc.  And now, at the end of the day, it's all done.  Wonderful work.

I would kill for this to be animated with like wind through the grass and his fur and gentle wind sounds going in the background.
Teemo love is everywhere, even in a new skin...

And then the sounds of explosions and screaming in pure terror as people enter the field and get blasted to bits and poisoned to death, and the death gurgles of those who are dying from the toxins slowly seeping through their veins...

That made me laugh so hard!! Hahah, the 'behind the scenes' of the champion's every day life.
A lot of setup and planning going into his next penta.
New Cinematic? I think so!

He enjoys the beautiful night sky as he then decides to leave his resting place, brutally kill many of our beloved champions, and take their personal possessions and hang them in a room just like Rengar.
Enemy runs at him through field. {{item:3070}} {{champion:17}}{{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JnaXekTA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-24T16:44:48.256+0000)
>
> That's beautiful :)  I can almost imagine the time-lapse video of the preceding hours where he busily finds just the right place for each mushroom, stopping to sip some water, unrolling his maps to check the distribution, etc.  And now, at the end of the day, it's all done.  Wonderful work.

I feel the timing of the release of this art is.... very very interesting.
What with your new teaser up and all.
Now all I can think of is Flanders Fields....
Damn you League of Legends Community and Riot Games!!!!!
http://i927.photobucket.com/albums/ad112/bwarneke/teemo.gif

This gif made me laugh so hard xD

Im not even sure why to be honest
This gif is perfection.
Thanks for the new wallpaper! This is awesome!
I'm so glad you like it :D Honored to have my art on your screen!
Same to me, I am using it as my wall paper

Nice Art.

.... I'm not ganking that meadow.

> [{quoted}](name=mjack33,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JnaXekTA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-24T16:14:33.968+0000)
>
> Nice Art.
> 
> .... I'm not ganking that meadow.

"And as the sun fell below the horizon Teemo sat and watched, thinking of all the glorious murder that was to come."

Also, seems you picked the perfect time to finish this piece.

http://skins.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/omegasquad/
That is so extremely exciting!! Hadn't seen this until just now :) Thanks for the link!

I really want to make this a gif. Like a little bit of wavering to the sun's color... all calm and peaceful...

And then in the distance...

*Step*

*POOF!*

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHH!

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=JnaXekTA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-24T13:57:13.493+0000)

> 
> And then in the distance...
> 
> *Step*
> 
> *POOF!*
> 
> AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHH!

XD

Yeah I can totally see it! It's all tranquil and you can even see Teemo's fur moving slightly to the breeze. Same with the grass!

And after like 1 minute of peacefulness idk {{champion:9}} steps on a shroom on the far left with that poof sound.

Teemo just sighs and the scene is back to a peaceful image.

And then in the distance...

Step

POOF!

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHH!

HA-HA-HA!

-----

Forgot something.

Yes! You freaking hit it on the nose!!!!

The next painting you do has to be this exact scene, except form behind or off to the side with like rengar or somebody sneaking up on teemo and choking on a mushroom...dont forget the sh!7 eating grin on teemo's face as they die ;)

I despise Teemo, and yet this is just too beautiful >:')

Good work Teemo... you little trooper you!

Thanks!! I'm really glad you like it :)
This is what top lane looks like whenever I play Teemo.

I would love to see Teemo's expression there....

http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/013/1/b/jude_evil_grin_by_iquitcountingstock-d4m8kgg.jpg

Really well done looks awesome.
I generally hate the little demon, but this is great!
OMG~R R R R R R R R R R R R R R~
plz ~teemo need nerf~ have -100%CD
I am still of the firm belief that that isn't the sun, it's a shroom someone just stepped on.

This is a very nice picture, and it really gives sort of a sense of teemo's calmness and forethought.

What it fails to convey is the part of Teemo that's a heartless killer, but that's fine; not everything has to be grimdark...

[or does it?](http://skins.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/omegasquad/)
Omg. :')
NICE WORK MAN
Wow... this is stunning. Excellent job! You could easily get a job on Riot's art team :P
why couldn't you use your power for good

great art.

Though I highly advise you to go to hell, you obviously belong to Satan himself.
"Greetings Summoners, after the recent success in utility of the River Rift Scuttler we've decided to introduce the Tranquil Open Field Scuttler"
Nice
I thought the Sun was the explosion from one of his mushrooms XD
this is so lovely!!! Liking Teemo and Liking PLAYING against Teemo are two different things entirely, hahaha C:
https://38.media.tumblr.com/744fe299b85f5fd74b2dfc706e605f67/tumblr_n8j5w0fNig1qzyzmoo1_500.gif
Dude, you always make amazing art! :D This piece with teemo is just so beautiful and the colors are absolutely spectacular! Keep it up!
Hahah thanks man! I'm really glad you like my work!
